topic.title: Suggestion - Add a vote move or delete to ZeroTalk
topic.body: Many visitors didn't read the rules or just post Ads everywhere which is annoying. Especially I felt shame to watch those people ignore other peoples' feeling and post Chinese stuff on the main section. Just wondering it's possible to add an admin or a vote hide (move or delete) the posts or replies function?

1604066062_mirrored_p24ce_github.body: When you are reaching the limit of each folder, it will ask your permission to make the folder larger. I guess this is the only way for now to keep peoples' files or chats. But it will also keep much garbage like Ads or meaningless topics.
